precondition: The Windows XP taskbar is visible at the bottom of the screen, displaying the 'Start' button on the left side.
action: Click on the 'Start' button located on the left side of the taskbar.
expected_results: The Windows XP Start Menu will open, displaying options such as 'Control Panel', 'Programs', and 'My Documents'.

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is open.
action: Click on the "Control Panel" option located in the right section of the Start Menu.
expected_results: The Control Panel window will open. The mouse cursor will change to an arrow with a tooltip box appearing when hovering over icons in the Control Panel.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel window is open.
action: Click on the "Appearance and Themes" icon.
expected_results: The "Appearance and Themes" settings window will open.

precondition: The "Appearance and Themes" window is open in the Windows Control Panel.
action: Click on the "Display" icon, represented by a computer monitor with a blue background.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes", "Desktop", "Appearance" and "Settings" tabs are visible.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab becomes active, and the window displays options for changing the screensaver.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab in the "Display Properties" window is open. The "Windows XP" text field is visible, indicating the currently selected screensaver.
action: Click the down arrow button located to the right of the "Windows XP" text field.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of available screensavers to choose from.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
action: Click the "Power" button located below the "Monitor power" section.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open, displaying the settings for the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme. The "Turn off monitor" setting should be visible.
action: Click on the dropdown menu associated with the "Turn off monitor" setting.
expected_results: A list of time options will appear, allowing the user to select how long the monitor should remain inactive before automatically turning off.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "System hibernates" dropdown menu, located within the "Settings for Home/Office Desk power scheme" section, should be visible.
action: Click on the "After 5 hours" option within the "System hibernates" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close, and the "System hibernates" setting will display "After 5 hours". The "Save As..." button at the bottom of the window may become active, indicating unsaved changes.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected.
expected_results: A "Save As" dialog box will appear, allowing the user to enter a new name for the power scheme.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Power schemes" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click on the "Always On" option within the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Always On" power scheme is selected, and the settings for this scheme (such as "Turn off hard disks:") become visible for adjustment.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Always On" power scheme is currently active.
action: Click the dropdown menu arrow next to the "Turn off hard disks:" setting.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of time options for turning off hard disks will appear.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" dialog box is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Turn off monitor:" setting is visible.
action: Click the downward-pointing arrow icon located to the right of the current time interval displayed for the "Turn off monitor:" setting.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time intervals to choose from for automatically turning off the monitor.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "System hibernates:" setting should be visible with an adjacent dropdown menu.
action: Click on the dropdown menu arrow next to "System hibernates:" and select the "Never" option.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close, and the "System hibernates:" setting will display "Never", indicating the system will not automatically hibernate.

precondition: The "Display Properties" dialog box is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" dialog box will close.

precondition: The "Appearance and Themes" window is open and active with the title visible in the top bar of the window. A red square with a white "X" is visible in the top-right corner of the window.
action: Click the red square with the white "X" in the top-right corner of the "Appearance and Themes" window.
expected_results: The "Appearance and Themes" window will close, returning the user to the previous screen or desktop.
